FFr_EA4474CC.DisplayName.Text: ||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_EA4474CC.DisplayName.Context: Flow/v01 Mission Structure - Mission Centric/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Text:
In this quest, the player/writer sets out to find a mythical narrative bible known as the Ehhh Aye*. Whoever wields the tome can use simple verbal prompts to generate narrative content guaranteed to make their game score 100% on Metacritic! 

Quest Outline: https://www.notion.so/chadbriggs/External-Lore-Page-Example-3c459c4d0ac842c99885f9059000c925?pvs=4



*See what I did there? Don't worry, there is a lot more where that came from! Hang on to yer knickers!

FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Context: Flow/v01 Mission Structure - Mission Centric/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_D9D98307.Text.Text: Use a Crafting Flow if you need to group several actions, otherwise use a Crafting Instruction.

DFr_2FC47D0D.Text.Text: This is a text string that is exactly 128 characters long, written in notepad ++, so I can easily see the character count below.

DFr_2FC47D0D.Text.Context: Flow/FLOW TEMPLATES/...: "This is a text string that is exact..."

DFr_83C2D768.Text.Text: Greetings Duhvel Opper! I seek a boon from you!

DFr_83C2D768.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "Greetings Duhvel Opper! I seek a bo..."

DFr_48943D5A.Text.Text: Let me guess, you want The Code weeks ahead of schedule?

DFr_48943D5A.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Let me guess, you want The Code wee..."

DFr_5806B944.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "Uhh... yes?"

DFr_7BE64636.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Then piss off. I'm busy."

DFr_5A8C48AD.Text.Text: Noooo... nooo... not me. Of course not.

DFr_5A8C48AD.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "Noooo... nooo... not me. Of course..."

DFr_FA4B2E92.Text.Text: Of course you do. *sigh* Go fetch the bucket of bits over there and I'll grant you early access to The Code.

DFr_FA4B2E92.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Of course you do. *sigh* Go fetch t..."

DFr_E539AFE5.Text.Text: What are you, an idiot? I'm a dwarf! I'm like 4 foot 5 in heels! Go get the bucket already!

DFr_E539AFE5.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "What are you, an idiot? I'm a dwarf..."

DFr_45BF975D.Text.Text: My friend, you are a giant among men!

DFr_45BF975D.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "My friend, you are a giant among me..."

DFr_93D60487.Text.Text: I do! I'll have you know it took me but mere seconds to walk across the room and find it, snatching it with supreme confidence.

DFr_93D60487.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "I do! I'll have you know it took me..."

DFr_1017D866.Text.Text: Well? Do you have my bucket of bits?

DFr_1017D866.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Well? Do you have my bucket of bits..."

DFr_FAD81D68.Text.Text: Can you give me some more details on the bucket? Is it say... bigger than a breadbox?

DFr_FAD81D68.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "Can you give me some more details o..."

DFr_AEC60672.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Ugh.... I can't even..."

DFr_CFCF4C79.Text.Text: It was the only bucket on the shelf you imbecile! Just give it to me!

DFr_CFCF4C79.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "It was the only bucket on the shelf..."

DFr_D41132CE.Text.Text: Stop yapping and test The Code already!!

DFr_D41132CE.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Stop yapping and test The Code alre..."

DFr_13CB1187.Text.Text: I've helped you all I can, piss off.

DFr_13CB1187.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "I've helped you all I can, piss off..."

DFr_1576B9E6.Text.Text: Why won't the ritual of compiling complete? WHY??

DFr_1576B9E6.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Why won't the ritual of compiling c..."

DFr_1CDFA02B.Text.Text: Ugh, how long have I been crunching? I need a mental health day.

DFr_1CDFA02B.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Ugh, how long have I been crunching..."

DFr_09584681.Text.Text: "The blade needs to cut through 60 orcs per second. How hard can it be?"

DFr_09584681.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: ""The blade needs to cut through 60..."

DFr_747DA647.Text.Text: They send a writer my way? Ha! The narrative in this game is mid at best.

DFr_747DA647.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Toxic Troll: "They send a writer my way? Ha! The..."

DFr_777B4B20.Text.Text: Finished! A fine blade indeed! Here, give it a whack on that block of Kew Eh over there. I bet you can split it in half with ease!

DFr_777B4B20.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Finished! A fine blade indeed! Here..."

DFr_857C59A3.Text.Text: Great! How long will that take?

DFr_857C59A3.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "Great! How long will that take?"

DFr_CF641138.Text.Text: Whoops. Well... that's what happens when you ask for early access to The Code.

DFr_CF641138.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Whoops. Well... that's what happens..."

DFr_652DB66E.Text.Text: Sure, if you want to stick around and wait for another build.

DFr_652DB66E.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Sure, if you want to stick around a..."

DFr_E8A86380.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "About a week."

DFr_CB23BDC8.Text.Text: What?? I can't wait that long! The Jeeerah Beast is sprinting towards the kingdom and will destroy us all!

DFr_CB23BDC8.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "What?? I can't wait that long! The..."

DFr_67C385E2.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "Can you make another???"

DFr_F4C48FD3.Text.Text: *shrugs* That's what happens when you have me grind 300 gig stones into a build.

DFr_F4C48FD3.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "*shrugs* That's what happens when y..."

DFr_980C738C.Text.Text: Hmmm... you could seek out the Toxic Troll in the Lost Forest. It's rumoured to possess the legendary Mace of Bug Squashing.

DFr_980C738C.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Hmmm... you could seek out the Toxi..."

DFr_09A0AAED.Text.Text: Smear some jerky strips on those gauntlets of yours and you might stand a chance. Good luck kid!

DFr_09A0AAED.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "Smear some jerky strips on those ga..."

DFr_616013F4.Text.Text: There has to be another way!

DFr_616013F4.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Player/Writer: "There has to be another way!"

DFr_51D50DF5.Text.Text: BUT... you won't win a fight against that thing without a serious upgrade. Seek out the Sacred Tree of Holy Jerky!

DFr_51D50DF5.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Duhvel Opper: "BUT... you won't win a fight agains..."

DFr_1493C8F9.Text.Text: LOL! Those gauntlets are so basic bro!

DFr_1493C8F9.Text.Context: Flow/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power/Toxic Troll: "LOL! Those gauntlets are so basic b..."

DFr_789773B0.Text.Text: What manner of wizardry is this? I've stumbled into a black void, seemingly designed hide me from what lies above!

DFr_789773B0.Text.Context: Flow/||LOCATION - The Pits of Gnesding/Player/Writer: "What manner of wizardry is this? I'..."

DFr_128A2034.Text.Text: I really have to pee. But I also need to return to the surface! The agony of this decision is soul crushing!

DFr_128A2034.Text.Context: Flow/||LOCATION - The Pits of Gnesding/Player/Writer: "I really have to pee. But I also ne..."

DFr_47A7050A.Text.Text: Nay, I must not empty my bladder! I shall return to the surface and leave this pit.

DFr_47A7050A.Text.Context: Flow/||LOCATION - The Pits of Gnesding/Player/Writer: "Nay, I must not empty my bladder! I..."

DFr_5C1BDA5F.Text.Text: Surely no one will mind if I take but a tiny tinkle? After all, I am obscured from the surface above.

DFr_5C1BDA5F.Text.Context: Flow/||LOCATION - The Pits of Gnesding/Player/Writer: "Surely no one will mind if I take b..."
